nav-about-text:
REPLACE_GAME_NAME is - or will be - a b rowser game - completely without Flash!

Instead, AJAX, JavaScript and Python are used.
The login is done via OpenID, a decentralised and open authentication model.

The graphical display is done by Bootstrap.
(This is 'Copyright 2013 Twitter, Inc under the MIT license.')

Font Awesome is used, too.

The processing on the client is done by jQuery.
(This is 'Copyright 2013 jQuery Foundation and other contributors' under the MIT license.)

The scripts on the server are powered by Werkzeug.

The error are handled - on the server and on the client - by Sentry, Raven and Raven.js.Raven.js is licensed under this license.

The translation is powered by Handlebars templates. (This is licenced under the MIT licence.)
